title: I have been waiting for PBE for almost a year now
body: I am very active but I've been waiting for pbe for a year now. I submitted it when i was like level 6 because I thought it was cool. I've been waiting for a very long time. I searched it up and people have said they have been submitted in like 3 days. Am I doing something wrong?

replies.body: I know that you've waited a while, and appreciate how active you been.  We really have no way to force or expedite a PBE application, though.  I don't have any info on how to get in beyond our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  I can only wish you the best of luck with admissions to the PBE!

Can't you please add an in-client notification? I had to createâ€‹ an email specifically for LoL and I never ever access it.
So, as far as I know, I've been waiting for PBE for two years now.

From what I can tell they typically seem to pick higher ranks (Gold and up) with more of the highest ranks being picked and sometimes specialize on certain types of people depending on what is in the update (i.e. Mage update had a lot of mid lane players and people who play mage characters a lot). Obviously if you are toxic and stuff they will not usually pick you either, but you do not seem bad. My roommate in college freshman year was on PBE when we first moved in and that was the stuff he told me, so just repeating it so it might not be 100% accurate.
